summary: A redguard female preset for RaceMenu
descriptionHtml:
Hello,
This is a preset of Salma, a mercenary Redguard, working for herself.
I hope you like this preset.

[b]Step 1 - Requirements :[/b]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu by [b]Expired (version 3.0 or higher)[/b]
[/url]
Step 2 - Mods recommended (for the same appearance) :

Body and face texture : [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url][/b]

Hair : In the screenshoot she has diferent haircut from SG hair (not ine the Nexus)
Brows : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows by [b]Hello Santa[/b][/url] > 02
Eyes :  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty by [b]Gabriel Mailhot[/b][/url] > FemaleEyeHuman1
Lips : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips HD by [b]EcthelionOtW[/b][/url]
Make up : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE by [b]Diethardt[/b][/url]
ENB : I use the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42957/?]Mistveil by [b]Modd3r[/b][/url][b] [/b]preset in my screenshoots. Other ENB are nice too.

Step 3 - How to install (for RaceMenu 3.0 or higher)

Copy the file Redguard_Salma.jslot here : Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets
Go into showracemenu
Go on the preset tab
Hit F9 for load the preset. 
Choose the preset Redguard_Salma.jslot

I put size at 0.98.

Enjoy!

My other preset :

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61168/?]Roxane preset for RaceMenu[/url] (Nord)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61317/?]Jocaste preset for RaceMenu[/url] (Imperial)

[url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/132183542@N06/]My Flickr gallery[/url]
author: Poupoulou
